entry.title: They Started It!!! (A Story On How to Piss Off Five Children and Seduce Their Father by Hal Jordan)
entry.summary:
Author: RegretsEverything

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 870Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 41

Summary: “My dad says adult bodies can’t survive on Red Bull and cereal alone. Do you even know how to cook rice, Mr. Jordan? It's your tummy okay?” Hal Jordan’s stomach is fine. His pride is not. For reasons known only to the universe at large, the Wayne kids have decided that bullying Hal is their newest hobby. In their under-twelve years of wisdom, they’ve concluded he is too single, too lonely, and way too funny when flustered. Hal tries to ignore them… until one day he snaps and fires back the pettiest way possible: He starts flirting with their dad. ----------------- Or Hal has beef with literal preschoolers as a literal adult man. The Wayne kids bully a full ass adult because he is an easy target and gives top tier reactions. Then they completely lose their minds when Hal turns around and seduces their dad. ----------------- No powers au. Neighbors au. Bruce isn't Batman. Hal isn't Green Lantern. The batkids are still menaces, though.

entry.title: How to lose a BAT in 10 days
entry.summary:
Author: mgnum_dng

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,772Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 216

Summary: Unbeknownst to each other, Gotham’s Dark Knight and the Emerald Ace of the Corps both make a bet — and the target is the same man.One’s goal: make him fall in love.The other’s: drive him completely insane. “Oh, I’m saying it.” Ollie folded his arms, bow on his back, beard smug. “Bet you can’t make Brucie Wayne fall for you.” Barry choked on his drink. “Oh my god.”Hal blinked. “Excuse me?” “You heard me. The great Hal Jordan — ladies’ man of the League, self-proclaimed heartbreaker — can’t possibly resist a challenge. You think you’re irresistible? Make Bruce Wayne fall in love with you.” “Bruce Wayne?” Hal said, incredulous. “The billionaire himbo with the tragic eyes and the yachts?” When Hal Jordan accepts a dare from Oliver Queen to make the famously stoic Bruce Wayne swoon within ten days, he treats it like just another challenge — part ego, part entertainment. Meanwhile, Bruce, ever the detective, has his own reasons for entertaining the cocky pilot’s advances. Keeping Hal close is the easiest way to study him… and maybe mess with him a little.

entry.title: The Shadow of Your Smile
entry.summary:
Author: 16thcenturyghost

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,640Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 146

Summary: Hal has a little secret. He doesn't think Batman's a bore, yet thinks that Bruce Wayne is a mystery. Bruce is something akin to a performance of careless charm and a sharp intelligence that Hal is determine to figure out. It starts out small really-a cup of coffee delivered with a smooth tease of "Looking a bit too dead there Spooky" and a satisfaction of watching the Dark Knight actually take a sip out of said cup. Months of effort and shared secrets disguised as routine slowly chip away at the carefully curated personality of the man that is Batman. Hal is patient- he is quite literally the embodiment of pure will. But the real breakthrough doesn't come during a world ending crisis. It happens after a grueling League meeting, when the Bat finally runs out of steam. He doesn't collapse from a villain's blow, but from the invisible, grinding weight of his own masks. When Hal gently removes the cowl from the barely conscious man, he realizes that he's finally seeing the real guy. Now, Hal Jordan finds himself guarding the most vulnerable man in the world. He is certain of one thing: he's not leaving until the man behind the cowl wakes up.

entry.title: Irresponsible
entry.summary:
Author: Starlordlov3r

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,405Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 33

Summary: Hal Jordan struggles with maintaining a balanced life after he becomes a single father to Kyle Rayner. While attempting to manage himself for his son, a certain someone keeps finding their way back to him, only complicating matters. Bruce Wayne is the single father to his four, mostly, adopted sons: Dick Grayson, Jason Todd, Tim Drake, and Damian Wayne. Despite his playboy reputation and arrogance to fend for himself, he finds himself falling for the same man. ^ few minutes or hour(s) [] few months or year(s) These marks will be used if there’s a time skip, just to keep the story reasonably paced and not insanely long (This isn’t comic or series specific, just based off the characters themselves ! Sadly, this story won’t be finished for a while... I’ll try my best to keep everyone in character since it is my first writing and I’m not an expert with every individual’s complexity …)
